headline.main: 11 COUNTRIES LISTED IN TARRIF REPRISALS; Survey Discloses Retaliatory Duties Imposed in 9 Months, Restricting Our Exports. OUR IMPORTS ALSO ARE CUT Value Is Reported Halved in Ten Chief Items From Seven Nations, Hitting Back at Our Law.

docs.snippet: Gold movements through the port of New York in September were on a smaller scale with a slight excess of exports. Imports aggregating $7,854,000 were received against, $10,975,000 in exports. These figures compare with imports of $4,683,000 and...
docs.lead_paragraph: Gold movements through the port of New York in September were on a smaller scale with a slight excess of exports. Imports aggregating $7,854,000 were received against, $10,975,000 in exports. These figures compare with imports of $4,683,000 and exports of $38,309,000 in August, and $14,450,OOD imports and $596,000 exports in September. 1929. A feature
